name: BeerSLAM!
description:
Throw beer cans at your mates with BeerSLAM!

Created for the BeerSK game jam, BeerSLAM is a local-multiplayer fighting game wherein you throw beer at your friends and the screen shakes a little bit until one of you wins.

Exciting, we know.

What you need:

  • A Computer
  • A Keyboard
  • A Monitor
  • A Mate
  • Two Fingers Each
  • A Fighting Spirit
  • Chemical X

Here's how you play the game:

Player One: A - throw, S - dodge

Player Two: K - throw, L - dodge

Holding down the throw button will increase your throw's power. Holding down the dodge button will crouch and empower your jump when you let it go.

Created By:

  • Tylah Kapa @JadeKapa
  • Jack Pettit @PB_Pettit

p.s It may be obvious, but we're prgrammers not artists. We'd love to continue working on this game into the future, as we think it could be something awesome with time and some loving.
